entry.title: Practical Deep Learning for Coders Course - Lesson 3

link.title: Practical Deep Learning for Coders Course - Lesson 3

entry.summary: This blog-post series captures my weekly notes while I attend the fastaiv5 course conducted by University of Queensland with fast.ai. So off to week3 where we learn more how neural networks and say the C word while learning neural networks ...
